remarks.format: ## Remarks The `userName` parameter must be in one of the following formats: `domain\username` or `username`. If the `userName` parameter is in the `domain\username` format, then there must be only one backslash (\\) character separating the user name and domain.

Docs.exception: contains more than one backslash (\\) character.
